H0.text: What is a form of word play that deliberately exploits ambiguity between similar-sounding words for humorous or rhetorical effect. Double Entendre

H1.text: What is a form of word play that deliberately exploits ambiguity between similar-sounding words for humorous or rhetorical effect. Homophony

H2.text: What is a form of word play that deliberately exploits ambiguity between similar-sounding words for humorous or rhetorical effect. Allusion

H3.text: What is a form of word play that deliberately exploits ambiguity between similar-sounding words for humorous or rhetorical effect. Pun

A4.text: A pun, also known as a paronomasia in the context of linguistics, is a form of word play that exploits multiple meanings of a term, or of similar-sounding words, for an intended humorous or rhetorical effect.

A5.text: A homophonic pun is one that uses word pairs which sound alike (homophones) but are not synonymous.

A6.text: Online Pun Generator Pro is used for creating AI-based puns, captions, humor lines, and wordplay variations.
